turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a pizza today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Lovely, where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a pizza from Home Slice Pizza in Austin, TX please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am here for you. What toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want beef and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, they don't have beef today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, what other toppings do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have onion, peppers, anchovies, pepperoni and some others. Do any of these interest you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, how about pepperoni instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I would be happy to help you with that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of crust do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a pan pizza please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will order that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That comes to $15.99. I can charge that to your card.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great the pizza will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I can't wait for the pizza!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt is being sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome
